scripts.routes: node -e "const path=require('path');const fs=require('fs');const {spawn}=require('child_process');const pkgPath=require.resolve('expo-router/package.json');const dir=path.dirname(pkgPath);const pkg=require(pkgPath);let bin=null;if(typeof pkg.bin==='string'){bin=pkg.bin;}else if(pkg.bin&&typeof pkg.bin==='object'){bin=Object.values(pkg.bin)[0];}else{const candidates=['build/bin/index.js','build/bin/index.cjs','build/bin/cli.js','build/bin/cli.cjs','dist/cli.js','dist/bin/cli.js'];bin=candidates.find(p=>fs.existsSync(path.join(dir,p)));}if(!bin){console.error('Could not locate expo-router CLI.');process.exit(1);}const cli=path.join(dir,bin);spawn(process.execPath,[cli,'routes'],{stdio:'inherit'});"
